column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This place would get 5 stars if it was not for us having to wait 45 minutes after our reservations to be seated. Although we had to wait and was worth the wait. Not only did the restaurant comp our drinks
column2: we got a seat in the basement
column3: which is a totally different vibe from the upstairs/bar area. The basement is decked out in dim lighting
column4: plush seats and chill music. We had the bone marrow
column5: halibut & dry aged steak--all amazing! Will definitely be back again. Perfect date night spot.
